abstract: Advocates for clean New York City waterways, like New York City Water Trail Assn, are expecting New York State Department of Environmental Conservation to strengthen regulation on sources of pollution in city's waterways; changes might place goal of having all city waterways 'swimmable' in reach.
lead_paragraph: More stringent regulations governing water quality standards are expected soon from state environmental officials.

headline.main: Advocates and Regulators Press for Cleaner New York City Waterways
headline.print_headline: Stricter State Standards Are Sought to Make All of City’s Waterways ‘Swimmable’

snippet: More stringent regulations governing water quality standards are expected soon from state environmental officials.

keywords.value: New York City Water Trail Assn
keywords.name: organizations
